titleStmt.title: Reports of certain cases arising in the severall courts of record at Westminster in the raignes of Q. Elizabeth, K. James, and the late King Charles with the resolutions of the judges of the said courts upon debate and solemn arguments / collected by very good hands, and lately re-viewed, examined, and approved by Justice Godbolt ; and now published by W. Hughes.

Reports of certain cases arising in the severall courts of record at Westminster in the raignes of Q. Elizabeth, K. James, and the late King Charles with the resolutions of the judges of the said courts upon debate and solemn arguments / collected by very good hands, and lately re-viewed, examined, and approved by Justice Godbolt ; and now published by W. Hughes.
titleStmt.author: Godbolt, John, d. 1648.
Hughes, William, of Gray's Inn.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.N. for W. Lee, D. Pakeman, and Gabriell Bedell,

notesStmt.note: "With two tables, one of the cases, the other of the principall matter therein contain'd."
Item at reel 1231:13 identified as Wing H3330 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of originals in the British Library and Harvard Law School Library.
